item.title: Your First Contribution to CPython
item.description: Do you love Python? I certainly do. Have you ever thought how cool it would be to contribute to it? Sounds scary? It is not! Python, or more specifically CPython as the reference implementation of the Python programming language is called, is an open source project like any other - nothing magical.
